sentences.en: China - EU relations are all - dimensional , multi - tiered and wide - ranging, exhibiting great vitality and dynamism.
sentences.cn: 今天的中欧关系是 全方位 、 多层次、宽领域的, 充满了生机和活力.

sentences.en: It also lacks Nigeria's entrepreneurial dynamism.
sentences.cn: 而且还因为南非缺乏尼日利亚的企业家活力.

sentences.en: It is this energetic feedback and element of anticipation that gives jazz its incredible dynamism.
sentences.cn: 正是这种充满活力的回应和充满期待的成分赋予了爵士乐不可思议的活力.

sentences.en: Many Zealanders owe their jobs and livelihood to the resilience and dynamism of the Chinese economy.
sentences.cn: 很多新西兰人将他们稳定的工作和生活归功于充满活力的中国经济.

sentences.en: New generation of diesel technology: Maximum dynamism, minimum emissions.
sentences.cn: 新一代柴油技术: 最大动力, 最小排放.

sentences.en: Shanghai is an international metropolis full of vigor, dynamism and variety.
sentences.cn: 上海是一座朝气蓬勃 、 充满活力、多姿多彩的国际化大都市.

sentences.en: Story - telling presupposes linguistic representation accessible to our meaning dynamism.
sentences.cn: 故事的叙?已经进入了语言的表象,其基本特性是隐喻性的.

sentences.en: Such changes are indicators of economic dynamism.
sentences.cn: 这些变化是经济腾飞的标志。

sentences.en: The large, sixteen - inch light alloy wheels emphasize the sporty character and overall dynamism of the car.
sentences.cn: 大, 16英寸轻合金车轮强调运动的性质和汽车的整体活力.

sentences.en: These projections are speculative , however, and tendto underestimate the dynamism of the environment.
sentences.cn: 然而这些理论仅是理论, 并且往往低估了环境自身的力量.

sentences.en: This diversity underlines the dynamism of our manufacturing sector.
sentences.cn: 产品如此多元化,正好显示出香港制造业活力充沛,积极求进.

sentences.en: We must have a regulatory structure that recognises that dynamism and adjusts to it.
sentences.cn: 我们必须具备一种认识到这种动态、并随之调整的监管架构.

sentences.en: What it lacks in dynamism it makes up for in placidity and a common national identity.
sentences.cn: 它的平静和共同的国民认同感弥补了其活力的不足.

sentences.en: Young Singaporeans seem to lack the astuteness and dynamism that they possess.
sentences.cn: 本地的一般年轻人似乎就缺少了那份机灵和朝气.

words.tran_cn: 动态的；动力的；动力学的；有活力的
动力学的（等于dynamic）；有生气的；有力的
动态地；充满活力地；不断变化地
活力；动态；物力论；推动力；精神动力作用

trans.tran_cn: （人的）活力，精力，魄力，劲头，[哲]物力论，力本学
